tooltip.clientbrandchanger.enable: Enables and disables ClientBrandChanger from hiding your client brand name.
tooltip.clientbrandchanger.brandName: The custom brand name to send to multiplayer servers when connecting.
tooltip.clientbrandchanger.ghostMode: Enables and disables Ghost Mode, which forces the client to act like a vanilla client during the login handshake. This will break multiplayer modded servers.
